entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:57 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
